articles.original_article_title: Dominique Reynié : «Comment le débat sur l’immigration est asphyxié par la stratégie de l’étouffoir»
articles.simplified_french_title: Débat sur l'immigration : une stratégie qui l'étouffe
articles.simplified_english_title: Immigration debate: a strategy that stifles it
articles.french_summary: Dominique Reynié explique comment la discussion sur l'immigration est rendue difficile. Il pense qu'une stratégie empêche le débat de se faire correctement.
articles.english_summary: Dominique Reynié explains how the discussion about immigration is made difficult. He believes a strategy prevents the debate from happening properly.

Dominique Reynié.display_format: **Dominique Reynié:** Politologue, directeur de la Fondapol
Dominique Reynié.explanation: French political scientist, director of Fondapol, a liberal think tank.

:.explanation: Colon, indicates direct speech or an explanation follows.

«.explanation: Opening guillemet, a type of quotation mark used in French.
«.cultural_note: Used in pairs ( « » ) to enclose direct speech or quoted text.

l’immigration.explanation: Immigration, the movement of people into a country.

est.explanation: Is (third person singular of the verb 'être' - to be).

asphyxié.explanation: Asphyxiated, stifled, suffocated, deprived of air.

de.explanation: Of, from (preposition, indicates possession or relation).

l’étouffoir.explanation: The 'stifler' or 'smotherer', a means to suppress or silence something.
l’étouffoir.cultural_note: Figurative term implying an attempt to suppress debate or information.

».explanation: Closing guillemet, a type of quotation mark used in French.
».cultural_note: Used in pairs ( « » ) to enclose direct speech or quoted text.

articles.original_article_title: Trafic de drogue : un important narcotrafiquant français extradé en France depuis Dubaï
articles.simplified_french_title: Un grand trafiquant de drogue de retour en France
articles.simplified_english_title: Major drug trafficker extradited to France
articles.french_summary: Un grand trafiquant de drogue français a été renvoyé de Dubaï vers la France. Il est maintenant en France pour affronter la justice.
articles.english_summary: A major French drug trafficker was sent back from Dubai to France. He is now in France to face legal proceedings.

:.explanation: Colon introducing an explanation or specification

narcotrafiquant.explanation: Drug trafficker (a more formal or specific term)

en.explanation: To, in (preposition indicating direction or location)

depuis.explanation: From, since (preposition indicating origin or starting point)

Dubaï.explanation: Dubai (city in the United Arab Emirates)
